Posts.Content: puzzler pleased to hear you eventually got help ....sometimes we need to be very proactive on our own account ......it took me 7 weeks to get 4 blood clots diagnosed !!!  I hope you can find a professional to trust ....best wishes Vioplex-T is an antibiotic spray powder. You can buy it over the counter in Cyprus but not sure in uk. I ask on holiday in Cyprus at the minute if anyone needs some. Unless your doctor will prescribe, it is excellent and I use it on any wounds, especially good when my nails dropped off. Yvonne
Posts.Title: what is the best Antibiotic for wound infection after mastectomy....

Posts.Content: Hi dragonlady it was just nowicantravel.co.UK . Anyone got any others they could recommend. I am on Herceptin for the next 12 months which I told them about. Thanks in advance. Love you all xxxx
Posts.Title: Holiday insurance Nowicantravel.co.uk

Posts.Content: I have just finished chemotherapy and radiotherapy and am now on herceptin but they would not consider me. Yvonne
Posts.Title: Holiday insurance Nowicantravel.co.uk

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, just been recommended by a friend All clear travel insurance. Told them my medical condition and even booked my husband on the policy. Annual policy £190 for the two of us. Very reasonable I think plus peace of mind. Did it all on line and approved straight away. Good luck everyone. Yvonne
Posts.Title: Holiday insurance Nowicantravel.co.uk

Posts.Content: Hi I do not post very often, but read your discussions on a daily basis. Such a brilliant siteand always very positive.  My question is I am having Herceptin after chemo and rads and am on my 7th Herceptin. The past 6 weeks I have had a buzzing in my head, have had my ears checked no problems there.  It is starting to worry me now as I am thinking the worst that maybe the cancer has spread to my head. Could this be a side effect from Herceptin, or anxiety or stress. I have been so positive since my prognosis but this is really getting me down. Any help would be very useful. Yvonne
Posts.Title: Breast cancer Herceptin

Posts.Content: Hi could you give me some information on this trial. I was due to have herceptin but after a heart scan found my heart as only performing at 45% so have been referred to cardiologist.
Posts.Title: Kaitlin trial for HER2 positive breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi nic, I live in Southampton and have recently joined this site. I was supposed to start herceptin but after having a heart scan found my heart only performing 45% instead of 65% . Considering I am 60 next week, never been ill in my life until April when I developed Bells Palsy, followed by double vision where I ended up going to casualty and being admitted to a ward. After two weeks of scans and blood tests they found a lump in my breast of 19mm. It was stage 3 cancer, so had my left breast removed. I have had 3 doses of Fec and am now just had my lst dose of docetaxel. Two more to follow. I have been referred to cardiologist and put on ramipril for my heart. As herceptin has an effect on the heart this is why I cannot have it at present. Thought this new drug of yours could be an answer. Thank you for reply. Yvonne
Posts.Title: Kaitlin trial for HER2 positive breast cancer
